title: Acoustic Metamaterial Absorber Design: Integration of Mathematical Modeling and Deep Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational physics, calculus, matrix operations, and Python programming comprehension
context.additional_context: Project-based learning where learners understand acoustic metamaterial design principles through mathematical approaches and apply deep learning-based structural optimization methods
